name: sam-rest-test
description: This project contains source code and supporting files for a serverless application that you can deploy with the SAM CLI. It includes the following files and folders.

scripts.dev:start-db: docker network create sam-rest-test-network; docker run --rm --name dynamodb --network sam-rest-test-network -p 8000:8000 amazon/dynamodb-local -jar DynamoDBLocal.jar -inMemory -sharedDb
